alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 2:37PM PST until March 05 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches. Localized amounts up to 10 inches or more is possible under heavier snow bands. * WHERE...Blewett Pass, Leavenworth, Stevens Pass, Holden Village, Stehekin, and Plain. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery, snow covered road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow accumulations of up to an inch an hour will be possible tonight and early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County
